channel.title: Bridge checking at startup
channel.description: I am using my custom list of bridges. When starting whonix gateway I see connections to all of them at once, I guess the availability check is done, then tor connects to a random bridge. I think this approach is less secure than just randomly selecting a bridge and connecting to it, without pre-testing of all, and then select another if previous is unreachable. Is there a way to change this behavior?
